title: Food Theory: Can A Slap REALLY Cook A Chicken?
author: The Food Theorists
description:
Special thanks to HelloFresh for sponsoring this video!
Use code FOODTHEORY12 for 12 free meals across your first 4 boxes + free shipping on your first box! ► https://bit.ly/3u9yGCB

Can you cook a chicken with a slap? Ever since I came across that idea, I knew I would have to cover it eventually. There have been a lot of attempts to make this work. Today Food Theorists, I will not stop until we figure it out. CAN it work? Could a HUMAN do it? Let's get slappin' and find out!

SUBSCRIBE for Every Theory! ►► https://bit.ly/2CdCooV  

 Want More FOOD THEORY?
You've Been SCAMMED! (Supermarket Secrets) ► https://youtu.be/EqviBPG2uPE
Tootsie Pops, How Many Licks? ► https://youtu.be/qOS5NAdyWDw
Never Order McDonald's Medium Fries! ► https://youtu.be/c_jnZkVlNtw
Kool Aid Man Is A Marvel Villain! ► https://youtu.be/CuZ14w_g3WA    
Don't Trust Your Cake! ► https://youtu.be/dulS3GGiJ7M  

Join our other Theorist Communities!
Game Theory! ► http://bit.ly/1qV8fd6

Editor: Pedro Freitas and Danial "BanditRants" Keristoufi

平手打ちで鶏肉を調理できる？そのアイデアに出会って以来、いずれは取材しなければならないと思っていました。これまでにも様々な試みが行われてきました。今日のフードセオリスト、解明するまでやめませんよ。うまくいくのか？人間にもできるのか？さあ、スラップして調べてみましょう。

毎回の理論はSUBSCRIBEで! ►► https://bit.ly/2CdCooV

你能用巴掌煮鸡吗？自从我遇到这个想法后，我就知道我最终要涉及它。已经有很多人尝试过这样的做法。今天，食物理论家们，我将不会停止，直到我们弄清楚。它能起作用吗？人类能做到吗？让我们拭目以待吧!

为每一个理论订阅! ►► https://bit.ly/2CdCooV
